field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #ID# - ID #ADMIN_EMAIL# - Emails of workflow administrators #BCC# - Emails of the users who have already modified the document at some time or who can modify it #PREV_STATUS_ID# - ID of previous status of document #PREV_STATUS_TITLE# - name of previous status of document #STATUS_ID# - status ID #STATUS_TITLE# - status name #DATE_ENTER# - date of document creation #ENTERED_BY_ID# - ID of the user that created document #ENTERED_BY_NAME# - name of the user that created document #ENTERED_BY_EMAIL# - Email of the user that created document #DATE_MODIFY# - date of document modification #MODIFIED_BY_ID# - ID of the user that modified document #MODIFIED_BY_NAME# - name of the user that modified document #FILENAME# - full file name #TITLE# - file title #BODY_HTML# - document contents in HTML format #BODY_TEXT# - document contents in TEXT format #BODY# - document's content stored in database #BODY_TYPE# - type of document contents #COMMENTS# - comments
